p: Recently, the synergistic effects of EO mixtures, with other EOs [ 34] or standard antimicrobial agents [ 35] have been reported. Both studies have proven that mixtures enhance the desired properties significantly. The seed contamination index (ICK, %) for all the fungal species identified in the case of wheat kernels fumigated with CEO and CEO/SEO mixture after 7 and 14 days, respectively, from treatment are presented in Figure 2.
